SEARCH
Module LabAssignment
Package boundary

Class CompanyRepView

java.lang.Object
boundary.CompanyRepView
public class CompanyRepView extends Object
The view class responsible for user interactions specific to a Company Representative. Handles input collection for creating/editing internships and displays internship/application lists.

    • promptNonEmpty

      public String promptNonEmpty(String label)
      Prompts the user for a non-empty string. Repeats the prompt until valid input is received.
      Parameters:
      label - The label to display to the user.
      Returns:
      The non-empty string entered by the user.

    • promptOptionalString

      public String promptOptionalString(String label)
      Prompts the user for an optional string.
      Parameters:
      label - The label to display.
      Returns:
      The string entered, or null if the user pressed Enter to skip.

    • promptLevel

      public String promptLevel()
      Prompts the user to enter an internship level.
      Returns:
      The level string entered by the user.

    • promptOptionalLevel

      public String promptOptionalLevel()
      Prompts the user for an optional internship level.
      Returns:
      The level string, or null if skipped.

    • promptSlots

      public int promptSlots()
      Prompts the user for a positive integer representing slot count.
      Returns:
      A positive integer.

    • promptOptionalVisibility

      public Boolean promptOptionalVisibility()
      Prompts the user to optionally set visibility.
      Returns:
      true for yes, false for no, or null to skip.

    • promptVisibility

      public boolean promptVisibility()
      Prompts the user to strictly set visibility.
      Returns:
      true for yes, false for no.

      Returns:

      Parameters:
      list - The list of internships.
      detailed - If true, shows full details; otherwise shows summary.

      Parameters:
      max - The maximum valid index (1-based).
      Returns:
      The 0-based index selected by the user.
